# Day 5: Print Queue

https://adventofcode.com/2024/day/5

## Part One

```
❯ perl middle.pl input | head
23 85,27,44,83,37,23,12,49,55,67,25
0 51,89,49,25,69,47,16
0 92,45,37,27,87,17,36,63,85,86,91
98 12,49,82,69,32,89,25,51,72,98,46,26,75,73,57,54,62,22,29
69 76,37,95,56,23,97,12,49,82,55,69,32,89,25,51,72,16,98,46,75,79
89 23,97,91,12,49,82,55,67,32,89,25,16,98,46,75,79,57,65,54
0 49,85,83,87,95,23,56,37,27
95 52,86,85,87,63,17,83,76,37,95,56,23,97,91,12,49,82,55,69
0 47,79,36,32,69,67,98,25,16
95 86,85,87,63,15,27,44,83,76,37,95,56,23,97,91,12,82,55,67,69,32

❯ perl middle.pl input | awk '{ sum += $1 } END { print sum }'
5108
```

## Part Two

```
❯ { sed -n '1,/^$/p' input; perl middle.pl input | awk '($1 == 0) { print $2 }'; } | perl swap.pl | head
25 49,69,89,25,51,16,47
87 36,92,45,86,85,87,63,27,17,37,91
37 85,87,27,83,37,95,56,23,49
16 67,69,32,25,16,98,79,47,36
95 87,63,15,27,17,44,83,76,37,95,56,91,12,49,67,32,89,25,51
89 55,67,32,89,16,98,79
46 32,25,72,16,46,73,81,36,92
91 63,15,27,17,44,76,37,95,56,91,12,82,55,67,32,89,25,51,72
12 15,27,17,44,83,76,37,56,91,12,49,55,67,69,32,89,51,72,16
14 75,57,62,29,47,14,92,45,28,15,27

❯ { sed -n '1,/^$/p' input; perl middle.pl input | awk '($1 == 0) { print $2 }'; } | perl swap.pl | awk '{ sum += $1 }
END { print sum }'
7380
```
